title: INV-012 CAPA-2/3: SOP-005 Submodule Workflow and SOP-002 QA Checklist Update

comment:
QA Pre-Review of CR-093 v0.1 — RECOMMEND

FRONTMATTER VERIFICATION:
- title: "INV-012 CAPA-2/3: SOP-005 Submodule Workflow and SOP-002 QA Checklist Update" — present and non-empty
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" — acceptable for v0.1 executable document (self-authorizing per SOP-002 Section 8)

DOCUMENT STRUCTURE (per SOP-002 Section 6 / TEMPLATE-CR):
All 12 required sections present:
1. Purpose — present; identifies this as INV-012 CAPA-2 and CAPA-3 preventive actions
2. Scope — present (2.1 Context with parent document reference, 2.2 Changes Summary with three numbered changes, 2.3 Files Affected)
3. Current State — present; accurately describes SOP-005 Section 7.1.1 step 6 and SOP-002 Section 7.3 checklist
4. Proposed State — present; describes specific additions to both SOPs
5. Change Description — present (5.1 SOP-005 Changes, 5.2 SOP-002 Changes)
6. Justification — present; four clear justification points linking to INV-012 root causes
7. Impact Assessment — present (7.1 Files, 7.2 Documents, 7.3 Other Impacts)
8. Testing Summary — present; "Procedural verification" appropriate for document-only CR per SOP-002 Section 6.8
9. Implementation Plan — present; six sequenced steps
10. Execution — present; EI table with 6 items
11. Execution Summary — present with execution-phase placeholder
12. References — present; governing SOPs and parent INV-012 referenced

Template Sections 7.4/7.5 (Development Controls / Qualified State Continuity): Correctly omitted. This is a document-only CR modifying SOPs; no code is affected.

PLACEHOLDER VERIFICATION:
- Draft-phase placeholders ({{...}}): None found. PASS
- Execution-phase placeholders ([...]): Present in Sections 10-11 as expected. PASS
- No TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX found. PASS

TRACEABILITY TO PARENT INV:
- INV-012 CAPA-002: "Update SOP-005 to include explicit submodule workflow steps in the execution branch model (Section 7.1)" — CR-093 Section 5.1 addresses SOP-005 Section 7.1.1 (new step 7) and Section 7.1.3 (new submodule paragraph). VERIFIED.
- INV-012 CAPA-003: "Update SOP-002 QA post-review checklist (Section 7.3) to include submodule state verification for CRs affecting submodule-based systems" — CR-093 Section 5.2 addresses SOP-002 Section 7.3 (new checklist bullet). VERIFIED.

CURRENT STATE CLAIMS VERIFIED AGAINST EFFECTIVE SOPS:
- SOP-005 Section 7.1.1 step 6: "Merge to main (see 7.1.3)" — confirmed at line 144 of SOP-005. No step 7 exists. VERIFIED.
- SOP-005 Section 7.1.3: Covers merge prerequisites and merge type only; no mention of submodule pointers. VERIFIED.
- SOP-002 Section 7.3: Six-item checklist and six QA verification bullets; none address submodule state verification. VERIFIED.

BUNDLING RATIONALE:
Two CAPAs bundled into one CR because they address related gaps in the same workflow (execution branch model and its verification). The EI table correctly separates them: EI-2/EI-3 for SOP-005 (CAPA-2), EI-4/EI-5 for SOP-002 (CAPA-3). This is an acceptable approach that avoids unnecessary document proliferation.

VR COLUMN:
No EIs marked "Yes" for VR. Appropriate for a document-only CR with no integration verification.

FORMATTING AND CONSISTENCY:
- Section numbering sequential (1-12). PASS
- Table formatting consistent. PASS
- No spelling or grammar errors found. PASS
- Markdown formatting consistent throughout. PASS

FINDING: COMPLIANT. Document meets all pre-review requirements. Recommend proceeding to pre-approval.

QA Post-Review of CR-093 v1.2 — RECOMMEND

- SOP-002: EFFECTIVE at v14.0. VERIFIED via qms status.
Both controlled documents listed in scope have completed their full review/approval workflows and are EFFECTIVE. VERIFIED.

- SOP-002 v14.0 revision_summary: "CR-093: Add submodule state verification to Section 7.3 QA post-review checklist" — references CR-093, descriptive. VERIFIED.

EXECUTION COMMENTS: "No deviations from plan." Consistent with execution record. VERIFIED.

EXECUTION SUMMARY: Present, accurately summarizes both SOP updates reaching EFFECTIVE status with no deviations. VERIFIED.

FINDING: COMPLIANT. All post-review requirements met. Recommend proceeding to post-approval.
